chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: Diary of Elizabeth Anne Jennings, later Anne Jennings Krush. Known to me and her other grandchildren as "Nanny." Her eldest daughter, Carol Krush, inherited all of Nanny's journals. Aunt Carol sent the journals to me in February, 2020.
This journal has an interesting set-up; one page for each day of the year, but with lines allowing entries for the same day on four different years.

listitem.para: 1931 - Sunday. No church. Bad cold & sore ankle. Jim took me for long drive 2:30 - 5:00. (ILHVBOA). Down to Sally's Ring fight. (You might know!) Supper & home about 8. Bill here (goody, goody!)
1932 - Tues. Got back Physics paper with a D-. I hope I won't be on pro. I'm mad at Bill. No letter. Darn.
1933 - Wed. Extra game with Freshmen which we manage to win again. Home & studied. Dinner with Dolly & guest. Studied tonite & bed late.

1934 - Thurs. Rain & many people saw Hal hanging from Green. More fun. He came down at 9. Lib & did Zo. Miss Murphy so swell. Rosemary gained. B.B. after Physiol. & we beat Freshmen. Queer foul shooting. Fun. We play Sat. now!
1935 - Fri. Chem. work. Heredity. Counted flies. Then Munger tea in aft. & lots of work. To vill also in aft & ordered for corridor breakfast. Studied. Wrote letters & can't remember the rest.
1931 - Monday. Cold still bad. Ankle better. Had hair cut. Came home. Read. Library tonite. Letters & bed early.
1932 - Wed. More rain! Nothing special happened. Home in aft & studied. Libe tonite.
1933 - Thurs. Studied Bible in libe. Home & had tea & studied all aft. Awful drawings for Zo. Studied Eng. Lit all evening. Washed hair & got to bed right late.
1934 - Fri. Worked about all day. To Love-Bucket Hobbs' for dinner. More darn fun - Ellie, Lucy, Ginny Tate, Beth, Ruth Harris, Carol etc. Crazy bunch! Home. Studied a mite & bed.

1935 - Sat. Up early. Lived thru classes. Mated flies. Then Marion Roe-Cloud, Betty McNally, Fairbanks, Peanut, Mudge & I to Boston Garden to Rodeo. Met . Colonel Jackson & cow-girls. More fun! Rodeo excellent! Nothing like it! Home. Long bells. Dead tired. Bed.
1931 - Friday. Gang went to Sally's, also Wally & Joe. Had fun although Dan was nasty to W & J. Bed late. First snow of season!
1932 - Sun. Studied all morning & all aft. Finished Ramuntcho. Walked to station tonite with Mudge & Betty. Wrote letters & bed early.
1933 - Mon. Awful getting back to classes. Gym this aft. Fun. Studied all aft & did Bible all tonite. Oh what is the use when I'll probably flunk it. I hate it! Bed late after Dobby's etc.
1934 - Tues. Behaved well in Zo today but Miss Murphy still chided me. Conf with Miss Melcher. She's nice. Lecture by Miss DeBanks on play & I almost slept. Slaved on German tonite & bed.

1935 - Wed. Up early Lab & studied for quiz. Had it. Then Peanut & M. Roe-Cloud & I to Peanut's with Helen Poor's car. More fun. Got there 3:30. Talked etc. Then after dinner Everett, Dick Downs??? & Bernie Hartwell came. Went out in roadster. Fun. Then Dick & I alone to "Ships Haven," 3 old fashioneds & did I feel them! Grand discussion tho & more darn fun. Had a (?) time. Then got other kids - (?) & home about 2.
1931 - Saturday. Did nothing till tonite. Bill R. took me to Sally's party! Was I ever thrilled?! He's so cute & dances divinely! I had a keen time, but wasn't hungry.
1932 - Mon. Mass meeting at Alumnae tonite. Home with Ginny & kids. Wrote letter to John & Betty & Ginny wrote, too. Saw Miriam Laurie & she's better.
1933 - Tues. Day of Q - Bible quiz & was I scared? Be happy, really, if I got a D & I don't fool! Wotta man! Relieved after it & French. Peanut & I to vil. Sundaes. Studied tonite & bed late.
1934 - Wed. Package, food & letter from Munny! Classes finally over & at last off to Prill's!!!!! Miss Girggs swell!!! Arrived & huge dinner. Melvin there. Movies. Fun. Home. Ate. Bed late. Such fun!

1935 - Thurs. Up at 10:30. A little headache! Then grand breakfast. Bobby, Rog, Ginny, Marion & I also, Mr & Mrs. Trask fooled around. Grand dinner! Games & card tricks till time to go back to W. Helen Poor beat us back. Swell cocktails & wine & the Trasks were so nice!
1931 - Thursday. Sally took Jim & me home. Cookies. Ice cream cones. G.R. tonite. Read & cleaned aquarium this aft.

1932 - Sat. Awful classes, 3. Field day in aft. Crazy football game. Movies tonite with Dobby & Ruth. "Night of June 13" & "Fast Companions." Good. Brisk walk. Almost late. Bed. Conference with Dean Knaper. Lovely. I like her!
1933 - Sun. Up for bekbets. Studied. To museum for Zo this aft. Home. Dinner at Latter Grill with Peanut. Home. Studied. Talked with Pril. Bed early(?)
1934 - Mon. First indoor gym. My what fun. Tore about. Dinner Bells. Then studied tonite in libe & over to Zo bldg to see Rosemary. She has awful diarrhea!

1935 - Tues. Another hard day. Hard time with Chem. Then 1:30 - 3:30 this aft spent selling chances on beans. Conf. with Miss Moody this aft & she was so nice! B.B. game with Juniors at 4:40 & we finally won 28-13 or something. I was LOUSY. Shoeny saved the game. She is grand! S.O.C. meeting at 8:30 tonite to make final arrangements. Oh di, I'm scared to
1931 - Friday. S.H.S. tied Arnold High 0-0. Wotta game! Down to Sally's etc. which is on wrong day. (Pardon me for living.) Dan's a nunt! (but nice)
1932 - Sun. Up late. Studied. Lunch at Noannett with Franny. Studied. Washed hair. Vespers tonite. Home. Letter, diary & studied.
1933 - Mon. First gym. Great sport. I like Miss Clarke, "Hicky." First snow of year. Dirty old snow. I guess we're in for it! Oh me! Prepared to have Junior tonite. Bed at 9:30!

1934 - Tues. Handed in more Zo. Got some back. O.K. this time. Vill. Home. Barny for dinner. Fooled around after it. To Agora for Bus. meeting. Home & Prill & I studied together. Rosemary killed today. Gassed. Oh dear! I'm so sad. She had very bad scurvy.

1935 - Wed. Up early. Over to Metabolism & fixed rats. Studied & then lab all aft. To see Miss Beall about Indoor Basketball & she was swell! I like her so much, di! Then dinner. Dressed, Miss Busch gave Fairbanks & me tickets to Tibbett concert. He was grand! Home. Bed late!
1931 - Saturday. Sally & I to town. Didn't see Aunt Hat. Shopped. Home. Sally's for supper. Sewed. Jim came. Pajamas good way done.
1932 - Mon. Rain. Phyiscs lab in aft & I worked hard. Joey's birthday! Sent him hanky. Home & wrote letters & studied before dinner. Bed early.
1933 - Tues. Junior arrived in the night, a healthy baby boy. Named him Vil Junior! Oh me! What fun. Honey here for dinner & we cut up. Wrote up "Progressive School" lecture for News. Bed early.
1934 - Wed. Didn't get very far with unknown(?) Crazy time in gym. Miss Salditt came for dinner. She is swell. I made usual no. of errors. French lecture. Libe. Home. Typed part. Bed.

1935 - Thurs. Vill & got boxes & left them at Miss Beall's. Payed bills & got check cashed. Classes & I messed up Chem. roll call again. I'm getting worried! Bells. Archery at 1:40. Then German. Then over & did flies. To Tonys(?) for tea. Kibby & Bryon also, our corridor. Blazer Com. meeting tonite. Awful. I didn't know how to (?) & I was in a dither. Anyway. But Miss Elliot grot Butsch & me home & then we found out. She, V. Saffort & me!! Oh gosh di. Never have I been so happy!!
1931 - Sunday. Bill, Joe & Wally here - 11:00 - 1:30. Awful break! (Bas---d). I certainly like Bill a lot. He is a peach. Read in aft. Sally's for supper - the gang.

1932 - Tues. First gym. What fun. Am next to tallest. Bee Short in class, with me. Got Zoology mark, C- Wotta life. I thought I at least got B- darn it! Sarah M to come for supper, but didn't arrive. Awful election, Roosevelt won! Darn! Darn! I think he's an awful mess! Oh dear! I wonder what will happen?

1933 - Wed. (I guess I think Roosevelt'ss O.K. by now!) Junior in fine health. Gang of Seniors in tonite to see him & did they make noise? Oh me! Bed late & I'm dead tired. Saw Mlle Malbot again. She's so nice.
1934 - Thurs. Craziest Zo lecture I ever did hear! Laugh. We nearly died. Play rehearsal & so dumb. Home. Dinner. Studied for German quiz. May go to dance Sat.

1935 - Fri. Wotta day. Chem work. Then Heredity & flies. 1:40 Archery. Hair done at 2:45. Then collected Blazers. Then dressed & Zo Majors tea at Pens & it was such fun! Home. Dinner. Over to Alumnae Hall & helped decorate & watched Vaudeville. Hoestly, di - everybody is so swell & Peanut has done such a grand job, especially.
1931 - Monday. Mother won match in tournament. I went to movies. Dumb murder thing. Home & read & bed late or early?
1932 - Wed. Betty fell & cut leg. Tough. Dumb old Speech class. No movies in aft. Entertained Mrs. Hobbs at Wellesley Inn for dinner. Faith, Kay, Libby, Betty Cutler & I. Fun. Libe & home & bed.

1933 - Thurs. Zo quiz at museum. I was awfully dumb, but it was fun! Bible all aft. or so it seemed. Freshman court for hazing fun! Betty & I to libe & to see a couple of kids. Washed hair & bed early.
1934 - Fri. Studied Zo in libe this aft. & Miss Murphy came in. Laughed over the lectore. Rehearsal for play tonite & I still didn't know my lines so well. Dead tired after it was all over!

1935 - I never thot this day would come! Classes. Field Day & I met Mr. & Mrs. Wysor(?) Swell. Archery - 199 - Bad. Seniors beat Sophs in B.B. 28-12 or something. We missed Wowie & Kilbon. Di I got A BLAZER! Oh gosh, I'm so happy!! But S.P.C at last tonite. Flew around & was scared to death. But loads of people came & it was a success!! I feel as if half my work is over now!!
1931 - Tuesday. Came home in aft. Studied & studied till 10:00 tonight. Worked 3 hours on Biology. Letters. Oracle meeting. Jim nice.
1932 - Thurs. Rain. Stayed home & slept this a.m. Zoology this aft. Bad news to Bety about sister. Tough! Studied, wrote letters & I fixed you tonite. Dreamt of Sally & Bill. Grr! Darn!
1933 - Fri. Up early. To vil with Dobby this aft & awful story about Nancy Clough. Got food for tonite. Fooled. Prill went home. Party at nine. More fun. Good eats. Left early & bed early!
1934 - Sat. Cleaned refrig. in a.m. & was I scared? Cut in only Sat. class. To vill & then House dance tonite & loads of fun. Oh me!

1935 - Sun. A day of rest & worry about what we made on the S.P.C. Wrote up report. Cleaned room. Studied quite a bit. Agora Vespers & then home & to bed at last. Fairbanks sent me the nicest corsage last night which I wore all day.
1931 - Wednesday. Came home. Biology. Bath. Sally's supper & all nite. Studied & read. Chapel & sat in balcony for 1st time. "Dignified Seniors."
1932 - Fri. More rain. Second gym day. Messed around. Laughed & laughed in Speech! Such a silly class! Got laundry & also brownies from A.H. Studied & bed early.

1933 - Sat. After lab went in to Boston to Art Museaum. After that, met Betty & Carol Morse, her little sister. "Met" & saw Fred Waring. Sawall(?) Army! Ate at "Old France." Home & bed early! - 11:30!
1934 - Sun. Up late & corridor breakfast. Studied a lot. Also studied this aft & tonite. I hope I'm not turning into a grind. Bed late after fun at Vespers with Prill & Barny.

1935 - Mon. Classes again. Chem work. Then Heredity. Then Chem lab all aft & gym. Back to gym for b.b. & I played twice. First night of season & I was a bit scared. But people came & I learned a few names & all is going to be fun.
1931 - Thursday. Lunch at Sally's. Washed stockings this aft. Talked to Bill (Thrills) Bowled with Munny (100) Sally & coffee ice cream. Studied & letters.
1932 - Sat. More rain in a.m., but it cleared up. Nice in aft. Fooled around. Bed early tonite after watching Ginny get dressed for dance. Ate brownies & drank cider.
1933 - Sun. Up for bekbets. Studied & studied & knitted & studied & wrote a letter & ate & studied & waited on supper & studied & walked & studied & to bed. Exiciting? Oh yeah?
1934 - Mon. Gym fun & then B.B. tonite. Just missed Miss Murphy. Steve there & she certainly is swell! Miss Beall also keen, but playing was lousey tonite. C in German quiz.
1935 - Tues. Rushed around to finish work. It's going to be hard now with B.B. Mon & Wed nights. Lived thru classes. Studied a bit. Then bed.
1931 - Fri. Cory beat us 18 -0, a rotten game. Knocked out Jimmy Boyd & Joe Cook. Nasty's. We had a band. Movies tonite with Bill & Dan.

1932 - Sun. Up late. Studied in a.m. & walk in aft will Ruth, Betty & Dean Knapp's dog. Studied. "Young Peoples" tonite. Mr. Parry grand. Ginny Trask brot mattress in & stayed all nite with us. More fun!
1933 - Mon. Liked gym better today. Hickey Clark is swell. To vil & ordered ski pants, bright blue. Did Bible all over the place & perhaps wrote a letter. Letter from Jim about game! Goody!
1934 - Tues. Suit (?) came from John. Also good news about his promotion. (Curse the day, tho & I felt badly) Agora birthday party tonite & I had to help get it even feeling miserable. Oh me!
1935 - Wed. Second basketball night but first of Wednesdays. Not quite as good a crowd tonight, but I got to play late. Miss Kilbon. She came up for a while. Stiff from gym & b.b.
1931 - Saturday. Army - Pitt game. Foggy & rain, but a keen game. Could Reider play? I ask you. Pitt had a keen demonstration.

1932 - Mon. Physics lab. Wotta life. Home. Knitted for doll. Walk tonite with Dally. Bridge in living room. Studied. Copied theme (A.H. etc.) Ate brownies. Bed 11. Ordered ticket home. Whoopie! 3 more days! Fun taking Ginny's mattress back.

1933 - Tues. Actuall remembered bells for once. More fun cleaning Necturus in Zo. Interesting course! Bible & Mr. Hasic annoiunced roll call & quize 2 wks from today. Misery! Messed around. Studied Chemistry. Cut in French.
1934 - Wed. Out of lab early, but had plenty to do. Studied. Cut gym. Dress rehearsal tonite. Went off O.K. Fun, but I'm dead tired.

1935 - Thurs. Barely got work done. Nasty Roll Call in Chem & as usual I messed it up. German this aft. Then to vil & got stuff. Agora to tea & Fairbanks & Janet & Peanut also. We had a swell time. Studied tonite & to bed.
1931 - Sunday. Wellfare Sunday. Bill here after church with Sally. I likes him. Bill & Dan & Sally in aft. Read & read & finished book tonite.

1932 - Tues. Talk with Miss Elliot this a.m. Knows me like a book already. Brot me down 10 or 12 notches. Party for supper. Finch, Emery, Schoenfuss, Lowenberg, Lewis, Luther, Short & I. Fun. Study. Letter.
1933 - Wed. First in a line of quizes. Chemistry & it was bad! More fun in gym this aft. Bible all aft & Zo all night - quite concentrated, but I know nothing. Lit paper also today.
1934 - Thurs. Need I say again that Miss Murphy is swell. Well she is in Physiology! Picture taken for basketball. Oh me! Studied all evening, German & Chemistry. Wotta life!
1935 - Fri. After great mistake, it was this Fri. that I went to Kenny Falkenauss for dinner. Then went to Zo libe & read for Heredity. Then home & studied after stuff - g'nite.
1931 - Monday. Wrote letters tonight. Studied & thought about (?) Welfared with Munny before supper.
1932 - Wed. Mudge nearly scared me to death with saying that I was on pro (?), but luckily she was mistaken. I was not on high credit list. Will know the worst tomorrow.
1933 - Thurs. Awful Zo quiz. Bible roll call not so bad. Got Pop's picture. Keen. Tea. Studied. Ate dinner with Tillie & Schoenfuss. Studied most all evening for Psych quiz. Washed hair. Bed late.
1934 - Fri. Awful Chem quiz! These affairs.??? To vil . Then slept. Play tonite. I was "Tall Tourist" in "Love of One's Neighbor." Loads of fun. Messed around afterwards. Bed early!

1935 - Sat. Classes. Studied Zo. Then Mrs. Hobbs arrived at Zo bldg. I saw her again. She is simply grand! To Boston & got gloves & socks & got measured for a Blazer. Oh gosh! Agora Program Meeting tonite. Home & talked etc. Bed late.
1931 - Tuesday. Not so many lessons; so went to movies with Munny. John Gilbert in "A Phantom of Paris." Awfully good.
1932 - Thurs. Conference with Dean Knapper & found I had one D in Physics, but I'm not on pro! Whoopie! I nearly burst a party button because I got an A in something!!!
1933 - Fri. Psych quiz, last of them for a while. Bible & awful classes. Went to clean up Barn prop room. Wrote letters etc.

1934 - Sat. Fairbanks & I to Boston at last. Sauterne for lunch & a Clover Club later. Saw Fredric March & Anna Sten in "We Live Again." Grand! Home. Agora Program Meeting. Letter to Munny & thot of this summer!
1935 - Sun. Up late. Corridor breakfast. Cleaned room. Studied. Dinner. Then studied & wrote letters & fixed b.b. list al aft. Agora Vespers. More study. Still writing up S.P.C reports. Bed late.
1931 - Wednesday. Got plays today. Washed hair. Studied. Got Dark Cow with Sally. Nothing important.
1932 - Friday. Conference with Mrs. Hobbs this morning. She certainly is a peach. She cheered up poor discouraged me. I like her more & more.
1933 - Sat. Up to Boston & shopped in aft. House dance tonite but Dobby, ?, & I went to movies. "Masquerader" - Good. Home & messed around & bed at 1:30! Was I mad!?
1934 - Sun. Up for breakfast. Studied all a.m. & most of this aft. Agora for Vespers. Miss ? of art dep't swell. Home. Studied & bed not so early.

1935 - Mon. Chapel. Then studied. Heredity. Same old chem lab all aft. Gym & it's swell! Stevie there. Then b.b. tonite & it's the nuts(?) Miss Beall is absolutely the most wonderful woman. I admire her tremendously.
1931 - Thursday. Came home & studied part. I actually learned it. Play practice also. (Fun in Latin Club. Puzzles etc.
1932 - Sat. Carnival tonite. Ginny & I barked at Puppet Show. Betty & Mudge did silhouettes - keen ones. Danced. Saw vaudeville. Messed around & spent about a dollar. Bed late.
1933 - Sun. Studied some. Dinner at Miss Elliott's - Hygiene students. Almost swerved again. Studied & what not. I lead a life.
1934 - Mon. B.B. tonite & was more on the stride. Played with Butsch a little. So much fun. Studied for French quiz. Tired!

1935 - Tues. Chem work this aft. Then meeting with Miss Elliott. She was swell. We talked aboiut other things besides S. Pool. Then meeting of Properties Committee & I got all hard props assigned. Yes, Fall Formals will soon be upon us!
1931 - Friday. Sewickley beat Ben Avon 13-12! Wotta game! We only saw the last half. Play practice tonight till about 8:30. Bed late.
1932 - Sun. We rose late. To Young People's tonite & studied most all the day. To libe in aft with Mudge & Betty. I was horribly silly, but survived. Bed early.
1933 - Mon. To see Miss Christian about Friday & Saturday nites & about going home. I can do it! Like her heaps. Gym. fun. B.B. tonite & I liked playing with Polly Starks. Libe & home & studied.
1934 - Tues. Dot Fagg for dinner. French quiz. She's awful nice. Studied. Down to vil to order food for Agora tea. Messed about & studied. Zo again swell.

1935 - Wed. Things go on. One week & we'll have a little rest. Worked over on rats all afternoon & we're certainly getting interesting results. Then gym & b.b. tonite & it's so grand di - I hate to think of when I won't be playing it!
1931 - Saturday. Mother-Daughter Tea. I ruined my ankle again. Movies tonite with Bill & Dan. Down to Sally's afterwards. Fun, except for cheating.
1932 - Mon. Physics lab in aft. Down to the vil & got yarn & shoe laces. Knit an my doll. Am knitting it a yellow suit. More darn fun!
1933 - Tues. Zo swell. Awful Bible. Meeting of Prop Committee tonite. I have quite the list. Oh me! The time to find & will I find it? What with going home & all. Oh well. It'll all be the same!

1934 - Wed. A- on Chem quiz. I'm so thrilled! Also A-- on German quiz. And also hoping to go to Army-Navy game. Oh me! I'm so high today. Miss Murphy & Mill Taliaferro for dinner & we all had a swell time!

1935 - Thurs. Again day of awful classes. I gave report in German & after that, everthing O.K. Then, Marion Fairbanks arrived tonite. She & Betty & I to McKenn?? for eats. Then home & studied & studied.
1931 - Sunday. Church with Sally. Bill, Jim Shorts & Wally here. Sally ( 4 of us) for lunch. Aunt Hat this aft & studied tonite. Bill to take me Sat.
1932 - Tues. Got numerals in B.B. Was I ever thrilled? I'll say I was! Gym today & passed first test. (Phooey)
1933 - Wed. Mlle. Malbot came for dinner & we had quite a French table. Stayed thru lecture. To vil with Pril in aft & got junk. Oh me! I like Mlle Malbot heaps. Called Stanley(?) No avail.

1934 - Thurs. Again Physiology. Got French quiz back with a C-. Damn! And the course isn't hard. Studied as usual most of the evening for German. Agora tea with Dabson & a little (?) with Miss Coolidge. Miss H Winter(?) nice.

1935 - Fri. Chem work & then Heredity. Off to vil & bot stuff for dinner. Finally, all aft. peeled potatoes. Then Miss Elliott, Beall, Marion & Betty, Hat, Demps, Stevie, Butsch & I dinner. (Potatoes french fried!) We all talke etc. till about 9. More darn fun, di! Then studied.
1931 - Mon. Latin test. Sally & I got ice cream cones. Candy & play at her house. Play tonight. Stroupy liked it. Home after watching Munny bowl.
1932 - Wed. Messed around till 4:40 when off we went to Keowns. Betty, Dolly Edmund, Ruth & I. More darn fun. Awfully nice place. Sat next to Art. Keen boy. Fooled & bed late.
1933 - Thurs. Got Zo quiz back. Lousy C. Oh me! Studied Bible in aft. & studied all evening. Betty's man can come to game & Ginny's Dick. There'll be 10 of us! What fun!

1934 - Fri. Did Zo all aft in libe. Miss Murphy crazy as heck. To Barny's for dinner & had fun! She's O.K.! Home & Steve told me things about Miss Murphy. Oh dear! Wotta life. Zo again tonite in libe, also French.

1935 - Sat. Lived thru classes after nearly cutting them both. C in Chem quiz & I nearly died. What a course! Then Elma & I to vill to try to get Victorian furniture. Then home & slept. Dance - Munger - tonite with Art. He gave me swell corsage. Bill Peck & Dorsey Richardson of Yale, both awfully nice.
1931 - Tuesday. Play practice at 3:45. Washed hair. Play practice 6:45. Home & studied for 2 tests. Health test today.
1932 - Thurs. Thanksgiving! Up at 10:45! Walked. Listened to game. Keen dinner & ate too much. Art real nice in aft. Made fudge. Dolly & I fought. Back to Eliot - darn. Bed late!
1933 - Fri. Chem quiz back A-! Awful Bible 4 days B.Q. To vil. Jim F. & Bill (?) arrived in motorcycle tonite. To vil & ate. Home & talked. Great sport! I'm tired! G'nite.
1934 - Sat. Bells etc. Did ice-box & got hair cut. Studied in libe after queer time with German. Studied also tonite & then fooled. Wotta life!

1935 - Sun. Up at 8:15. Helped get corridor breakfast. Then Betty, Marion Faribanks & I to Boston - Trinity Church & Dr. Kinsolving very interesting. Dinner at Seville & out on 2 train. Fixed b.b. & studied Heredity & for (?) quiz till about 11:30. More crazy fun at dinner since missed Agora.
